gaslessVotingDescription: Create a paymaster to sponsor network fees for proposal votes. The paymaster will be created after your DAO is deployed.
gaslessVotingGettingStarted: To get you started, we're covering your first 0.1 {{symbol}} of gas fees. You can top up your balance in your DAO settings.
gaslessVotingDescriptionSettings: Create a paymaster to sponsor network fees for proposal votes.
starterPromoDescription: Join our Telegram and reach out to our team to learn how to get your network fees covered by Decent:
createSmartWalletDescription: You need to create a Smart Wallet to access Sponsored Voting.
cancelCreateSmartWalletConsequence: If you continue without creating it, you will need to pay for gas fees on every transaction.
createSmartWalletOneTimeGasFeeNotice: Creating your Smart Wallet will require a one-time gas fee.
insufficientPaymasterBalance: The DAO paymaster does not have enough balance to sponsor your vote at this time.
createSmartWalletSuccess: Your Smart Wallet has been created successfully.
voteIsSponsoredSubtitle: Enjoy zero fees for this vote!
